author: bryanduxbury
msg: This patch updates the thrift_native package to use 1.9 compatible macros and fixes the pure ruby stuff to behave equally well in ruby1.8.6-ruby1.9.

author: matzew
msg: TRINIDAD-1438 - M2 Plugins: Need a way to define a new converter or validator tag with the existing Id
Thx to Max Starets for the patch

author: shuston
msg: Tag trunk where it is merged out to the cmake branch, 25-Mar-09

author: fapeeler
msg: switch_state - added check for reload state if found ignore logid
insert_reload_request - set logid variable to zero instead of using the logid of previous user reservation
reservation_failed - added check for proper states to update the ending flag on the specified logid
